title: Luminite Hammers
summaries: Luminite Hammers are four tools. The four types are the Solar Flare Hammer, Vortex Hammer, Nebula Hammer, and the Stardust Hammer, each themed after a different Celestial Tower. They are all unable to be crafted, and instead the player must craft the Luminite Hamaxes.

statistics.Sell: 8
